name: Moody
description: This mon has some pretty crazy mood swings, from happy to angrybat the drop of a pin.
effect: At the end of the round this pokemon receives a +2 boost to a random Stat and -1 boost to a different Stat amongst Strength, Special, Defense, Special Defense, and Dexterity. This ability's affect can stack between rounds, but is still restricted by the Stat Boost cap.
